content: Centennial Medical Group's quarterly provider report highlights increased referrals to Maplewood Rehabilitation Center following the implementation of new chronic pain management protocols. Patients aged 45-65 with degenerative disc disease showed 32% improvement in mobility scores when combining aquatic therapy with targeted nerve blocks. The center processed 142 prior authorizations for these treatments in Q3 2023, with an average approval time of 4.2 business days. Dr. Elena Marquez noted particular success in cases utilizing the updated phased treatment approach.
